prompt: I remember when I was younger waiting Christmas Day to unwrap presents.  There were a lot of things I wanted that year.
My Cd player keeps skipping nothing can stop it.
Yesterday I saw a mother beating up her kid. I couldn't believe it!
When I was a child I was in a destructive tornado.
I am happy with what I have in life.
There is a new restaurant in my neighborhood and it is quite good. We don't have good restaurants.
My sister is always the sibling that my parents talk about. Sometimes I wonder if they even notice me.

Once I realized that I needed at least a 31 on my ACT in order to get a nice little scholarship for college. I studied my heart out to improve my 29 and I felt super confident that I'd get the 31. Instead I actually got a 33!
she was m only true friend
